I'm building this clock from scratch and trying to figure out the fonts for the numbers on the clock face and "The Future is Now"

I'm desperate, please help. Thanks!
author: Sameagle

comments.content:
|The Future is Now| appears to be based on Gillies Gothic (customized the |T| to mimic the |F|):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gillies-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gillies-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gillies-gothic/")

Haven’t been able to ID the numerals....
thank you! let me know if you find anything on the numerals

The numbers are a variation on a circa 1900 style used in the font Secession

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SecessionNumbers_4165.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/")  
Don

From the same era, another variation ITC Rennie Mackintosh Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ITCRennieMackintoshBoldNumbers_6431.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-rennie-mackintosh/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-rennie-mackintosh/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-rennie-mackintosh/")  
Don

I checked my usual suspects and did not find a closer match.  
I am not certain whether it would be easier for you to tinker with the numbers in these fonts, or make the numbers from scratch.  
Don

If you are making your own numbers, this perspective corrected image should help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130160743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NumeralsClockHudsuckerProxyMovieTypophile122853aSM_4381.jpg)
  
Don
